overview.business_description: Italian fintech company and PayTech leader. Provides payment solutions, digital banking, and merchant services. Formed through merger of Nexi, Nets, and SIA.
business_positives: Recently upgraded to investment grade (BBB-) by Fitch
overview.fatal_flaw: Significant debt from M&A consolidation; competition from global payment players; regulatory risk
overview.recent_news: Fitch upgraded to BBB- investment grade (Dec 2024). S&P upgrade to BBB- also achieved. Net debt €4.97bn, leverage 2.7x. €500m buyback completed.

credit_opinion.summary: Nexi has achieved investment grade status from both Fitch and S&P following consistent deleveraging. Strong EBITDA growth and margin expansion support the credit profile. Leverage expected to fall below 3x.
key_risks: Competition from global payment players (Stripe, Adyen)
credit_opinion.recommendation: OVERWEIGHT - Investment grade momentum, strong margins
